description: Kerala is world-renowned for being the best destination for Ayurvedic treatments and therapies. If you are looking forward to have some relaxing time away from the hustle-bustle of the daily city life then opt for Kovalam Ayurveda tour of 8 nights and 9 days.
details: A consultation from the expert Ayurvedic physicians
A boat cruise on the Thiruvallam backwaters
